songs.title: Heart So Cold Like Ice*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Intro]
AK BEATZ you fired up

[Chorus]
Progress on my pride, but the high look like sunrise
So my pray to god, it's hoping I ain't in a mosh
They know my head get hot, but my hearts so cold like ice
Now they wanna hit me up, but now I can't reply
I'm doin' more, but you know I just ain't less
How many you afford, but you don't ever forfeit
Recognizing real they know who's next
If you want a cut, then come and place your bets
Much money on me, guarantee you double deck
Got an iceberg on my neck, that's a hundred racks
Kill a creature with this K for the bricks to crack
Watching it all dissolve, then relax
May the dream come true to the point anywhere on the map
Focus through you know I had to choose, that's gang
Got a helping help, gotta watch out who I dap
You want a jog, then borrow my pants
